A "Smart Wheelchair" that can navigate through different environments using AI technology, allowing people in wheelchairs to explore new places with ease.
A "Fitness Wheelchair" that incorporates resistance bands and other exercise equipment into the chair itself, making it possible for wheelchair users to work out while sitting.
A "Mobile Workspace Wheelchair" that includes a laptop stand and a small desk, allowing wheelchair users to work from home or on-the-go.
A "Wheelchair Massage Chair" that uses massage techniques to help relieve tension and promote relaxation for wheelchair users.
A "Self-Driving Wheelchair" that uses autonomous driving technology to take wheelchair users where they want to go without the need for human assistance.
